definition-item.definition-title: MAKING PARTICULAR METAL OBJECTS BY ROLLING, e.g. SCREWS, WHEELS, RINGS, BARRELS, BALLS (essentially from sheet metal B21D)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming metal objects by rolling operations which are not combined with further different metal-working operations.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Continuous rolling of semi-finished products (e.g. continuous rolling of metal strip, wire or tubes in rolling mills)
Roll-forming (i.e. consecutive bending) of metal sheet

definition-item.definition-title: Making articles shaped as bodies of revolution (rolling tubes B21B17/00 - B21B25/00)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for manufacturing rotationally symmetric bodies.

table-column.paragraph-text: Rolling of threads or gear profiles onto cylindrical bodies

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: cylinders, e.g. rolled transversely {cross-rolling}

section-body.paragraph-text: Cross-rolling of cylindrical workpieces with rollers having an axis of rotation parallel to the axis of the workpiece. In most cases recesses are formed on the workpiece by a profile on the rollers which varies in width.

table-column.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of gear toothing by rollers having an axis of rotation parallel to the axis of the workpiece

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: rolled longitudinally

section-body.paragraph-text: Forming of profiles or reduction in cross-section by rollers or roller-segments having an axis of rotation not parallel to the axis of the workpiece.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Continuous reduction in cross-section of workpieces

definition-item.definition-title: characterised by use of rolls having circumferentially varying profile{; Die-rolling}

section-body.paragraph-text: Forming of profiles or reduction in cross-section with the help of rollers or roller-segments comprising a die
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Making helical bodies or bodies having parts of helical shape (helical gears B21H5/00; forming tubes or tube walls into helical shape B21D11/06, B21D15/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming a helical structure like a thread or helical flutes on a body by a chipless rolling process. The group covers plastic deformation of the metal body to produce a thread structure without cutting or milling and includes cold thread rolling (swaging).
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bending of a body into helical form
Forming of helical structures on a body by forging or pressing

definition-item.definition-title: Making by means of profiled-rolls {or die rolls}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices in which the external screw-thread is manufactured by means of profiled rolls, but which do no comprise or further specify the use of a thread rolling head.

table-column.paragraph-text: Profiled rolls for making gear wheels

definition-item.definition-title: {Thread-rolling heads}

section-body.paragraph-text: Handtools for rolling a thread on a workpiece. General aspects of thread rolling heads and methods of using a thread rolling head not related to a special type of thread-rolling head.

definition-item.definition-title: {working axially}

section-body.paragraph-text: Axial thread rolling methods and devices for forming external screw-threads using a thread-rolling head working axially, i.e. the rollers have a continuous and constant profile about their circumference and run axially along the workpiece. During rolling the workpiece passes through an axial bore within the rolling head.

definition-item.definition-title: {working radially}

section-body.paragraph-text: Radial thread-rolling methods and devices, the thread-rolling head forming a thread in one single rotation of either the workpiece within the rollers or the rolling head about the workpiece. The rollers are provided with a circumferentially varying profile and/or are eccentrically mounted within the rolling head. The workpiece is inserted axially into the rolling head. After insertion of the workpiece the rollers approach the workpiece radially.

definition-item.definition-title: {working tangentially}

section-body.paragraph-text: Tangential thread-rolling methods and devices, the thread-rolling head being fed tangentially against the rotating workpiece.

In order to allow a tangential insertion of the workpiece into the rolling head, the radial distance between the rollers can be varied. Some rolling heads comprise rollers having a varying circumferential profile in order to allow the insertion of the workpiece.

definition-item.definition-title: Making by means of profiled members other than rolls, e.g. {reciprocating flat dies or} jaws, moved longitudinally or curvilinearly with respect to each other

section-body.paragraph-text: Rolling of threads by means of reciprocating flat dies, wherein the dies are reciprocated in relation to one another or a stationary die is provided and the other die is reciprocated.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rolling of cylindrical gears by means of reciprocating flat dies

definition-item.definition-title: {Planetary thread rolling}

section-body.paragraph-text: Planetary thread rolling methods and devices, i.e. rolling of threads between a stationary and a rotatable die.

definition-item.definition-title: articles with helicoidal surface (bending strip or the like helically B21D11/06)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming a helical structure like helical fins on a workpiece by rolling, including a workpiece that is rotated and longitudinally moved relative to rolling dies or the dies are rotated and the workpiece is longitudinally moved relative to rolling dies without rotation.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Making gear wheels{, racks, spline shafts or worms}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for manufacturing or finishing geared workpieces by a chipless rolling process. This group does not only cover the manufacturing or finishing of gear wheels, but also of racks, spline shafts and worms.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of gear wheels by forging or pressing
Manufacturing of toothed racks by forging or pressing
Making gears or toothed racks by other methods
Making gear wheels by other methods

definition-item.definition-title: {Worms}

section-body.paragraph-text: Making work wheels or gears with a helical toothing
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: with cylindrical outline{, e.g. by means of die rolls (worms B21H5/005)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for manufacturing external gear toothing on cylindrical workpieces by means of die rolls.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Making of internal gear wheels by rolling
Manufacturing of gear wheels by means of flat dies
Spinning in order to manufacture other products than gear wheels

definition-item.definition-title: {Finishing gear teeth with cylindrical outline, e.g. burnishing}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for finish-rolling of preformed gear wheels, in particular of sintered gear wheels, by rolling or burnishing, including compacting of sintered powder gearing teeth by rolling.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rolling of toothing into cylindrical blanks without preformed gear teeth
Finishing gear teeth by other tools

definition-item.definition-title: {Internally geared wheels}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for manufacturing internal gear toothing on cylindrical workpieces. This subgroup also covers the manufacturing of such gears by spinning or by the so-called "Grob"-process, in which eccentrically mounted rollers hit the workpiece

table-column.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of internal gear toothing by rolling
Manufacturing of internal gear toothing by spinning
Manufacturing of internal gear toothing by the "Grob"-process

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Rolling of external toothing into cylindrical blanks without preformed gear teeth

definition-item.definition-title: {by rolling using reciprocating flat dies, e.g. racks (B21H5/022 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of gear teeth on a workpiece by relatively reciprocating flat dies or racks.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Manufacturing of external threads on a workpiece by means of reciprocating flat dies

definition-item.definition-title: bevel gears

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for rolling bevel gears.

definition-item.definition-title: Making articles not provided for in the preceding groups, e.g. agricultural tools, dinner forks, knives, spoons (nails, pins B21G3/30)

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for manufacturing particular articles by rolling.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Making particular articles by working sheet metal
Making of needles, pins and nails
Making particular articles by forging or pressing
Making specific metal objects by operations not covered by a single other subgroup

definition-item.definition-title: grooved pins; Rolling grooves, e.g. oil grooves, in articles {(B21H5/00 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: Rolling grooves like oil grooves in general.

definition-item.definition-title: {Rolling annular grooves}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming annular grooves in a workpiece by rolling.

definition-item.definition-title: {Filet rolling, e.g. of crankshafts}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for finishing, i.e. burnishing, of annular grooves by rolling, in particular for deep rolling of crankshaft fillets.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Rolling helical or rectilinear grooves}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming helical or rectilinear grooves in a workpiece by rolling.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Making articles with helicoidal surface by rolling

definition-item.definition-title: Rolling metal of indefinite length in repetitive shapes specially designed for the manufacture of particular objects {, e.g. checkered sheets}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for forming repetitive structures on a workpiece by rolling.

definition-item.definition-title: {Embossing sheets or rolls}

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for roll embossing or roll stamping of workpieces, i.e. for impressing a discrete pattern into a sheet, strip or roll of metal, often for creating a decorative pattern.
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Surface roughening or texturing within a rolling mill
Rolls with a roughened or textured surface; methods for making the same
Machines and rolls for embossing decorations

definition-item.definition-title: Feeding arrangements for rolling machines or apparatus manufacturing articles dealt with in this subclass

section-body.paragraph-text: Methods and devices for feeding blanks to be rolled into or extracting rolled workpieces from a rolling device.
